@Version("1.7.0")

Package com.adobe.granite.asset.api

This package defines Asset API to manage digital assets. The API is implementation agnostic, thus the persistence model is outside the scope of this API.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Asset
    Asset represents a digital resource.
    AssetManager
    AssetManager is a primary interface which provides methods to manage Assets.
    AssetMetadata
    AssetMetadata defines the Asset metadata.
    AssetRelation
    AssetRelation defines the Asset relation.
    AssetVersion
    AssetVersion represents a particular version of an Asset.
    AssetVersionManager
    AssetVersionManager provides methods to manage AssetVersions.
    BinaryRendition
    BinaryRendition is a read only representation of a particular rendition of an Asset.
    Rendition
    Rendition is a read only representation of a particular rendition of an Asset.
    RenditionHandler
    The RenditionHandler interface defines the API for rendition handlers.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AssetException
    Exception facade for all Asset related exceptions.
    AssetIOException
    Exception to be used for all Asset I/O related operations
